RULES.RULE1: When the increment button is clicked, the counter increases by 1
RULES.RULE2: When the decrement button is clicked, the counter decreases by 1
RULES.RULE3: When the counter reaches 10, the background color changes to #e74c3c
RULES.RULE4: When the counter reaches -10, the background color changes to #27ae60
RULES.RULE5: The increment / decrement coef is multiplied by 2 every 30 actions

UP.LABEL: Increment the counter
UP.TOOLTIP: Click on this button to increment the counter's value

DOWN.LABEL: Decrement the counter
DOWN.TOOLTIP: Click on this button to decrement the counter's value

RESET.TITLE: Want to reinitialize the counter ?
RESET.RULE: Warning ! Only users that are over the age of 18 are allowed to reinitialize the counter
RESET.SUBMIT_TOOLTIP: By clicking this button, the counter will be reinitialized
